column1: Table 5.8: Salient details of Narankandura Mahapitiya Wewa, Narankandura Wewa and Kingsway Watta Wewa

column2:
Demarcate boundaries of restricted forest area (1 Ac) and fence.
Desilting.
column3: Extend the sluice pipe by 12ft, Fill the bund and the downstream, Raise the upstream perimeter bund 12m-L, Concrete wall, Expand the tank(1/4AC) and increase the tank capacity, Build a fence to the tank  road, Tree planting (Kumbuk, Mee)
column4: Desilting (1/4 AC), Reconstruct the sluice. Fill soil and increase the height of the tank bund up to 1 ft, Gate Lift rod, Hoisting arrangement
column5: Desilting, Sluice gate hoisting, Lifting the rod, Allocate a 1/2ac area for a reserved forestry and plant Kumbuk trees in that area, Desilting, Make a protective fence for the reserved forest of 1/2ac,Remove the waste, Put notice boards
